name: RESCUE: 661
description:
In the battlefield, the soldier Ricky has to face with the adventure full of danger and challenge in order to save his teammate Barry. Ricky should not only face the vicious enemy, but also face the temptation and tease of fate.

Rescue: 661 is a simple shooter game in which players play as a soldier who can use three different types of weapons. In the progression of each game, player need to save Barry in a limited time.

The concept of the game is to show the further you go, the more you lose. The core gameplay mechanic is just to show this concept. Maybe not interesting enough, but meaningful.
